name: 5.11 "The Book of Samuel" Online Trivia | 'Cheers'- Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Sam first try to pick the person to be in charge of the bar?
options: Bubble Gum Bubble Gum in a Dish
questions.explanation:
One Potato, Two Potato.

	Sam couldn't choose between Carla, Diane and Woody so he wanted to use the "one potato, two potato" method for picking. Diane didn't think that was a very good way to choose.

questions.text: When Sam did "My dog died last night" what color did Diane pick for the blood?
questions.explanation:
Mauve.

	Diane thought this was a disgusting game but she finally picked a color. When she picked mauve he couldn't spell it.

questions.text: Who did Sam put in charge?
options: No one he didn't go on his fishing trip after all
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Sam said he picked Woody because he's the only one who hasn't irritated him in the last five minutes. Carla told Woody, "I think you're gonna enjoy this weekend, boss." Sam told him to keep the bat with him at all times.

questions.text: What did Woody keep saying when Frasier spoke to him?
questions.correct: "I know just how you feel, Dr. Crane."
questions.explanation:
"I know just how you feel, Dr. Crane."

	Woody didn't want to listen to Frasier go on about stuff so that was his answer for everything. The one time he didn't respond that way was when Frasier ordered a drink. Then he said, "Coming right up, Dr. Crane."

Beth.

	Beth was played by Amanda Wyss. She appeared on an earlier episode in which her and Woody couldn't stop eating. She dumped Woody via the mail.

Sam's cleaning woman.

	Deseree was played by Katherine McGrath. McGrath was born in 1944 in Winchester, MA.

questions.text: How did Woody's ex-girlfriend figure out that the woman Woody said was his new girlfriend wasn't?
questions.correct: She forgot his name twice during dinner.
options: She told the his ex-girlfriend he wasn't.
questions.explanation:
She forgot his name twice during dinner.

	Woody just met Deseree that day and she couldn't remember his name. Deseree thought she was there for a housecleaning position  which made for some very funny stuff.

questions.text: Who was Woody's ex-girlfriend going to marry?
questions.explanation:
Leonard.

	Leonard was played by John Brace. He was also in the movie "Truth or Dare: A Critical Madness" in which he played Mike Strauber.

questions.text: Who was the next person to be in charge after Woody left?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla and Diane decided to let the bar decide. Carla then said if they picked her, Diane would not give a speech. She won instantly.

questions.text: Who sang "Where Everybody Knows Your Name" (the "Cheers" theme)?
questions.explanation:
Gary Portnoy.

	The theme song was written by both Gary Portnoy and Judy Hart Angelo but was performed by Gary Portnoy. Portnoy was born in Brooklyn. Along with Judy Hart Angelo he also wrote the theme song to "Punky Brewster".
